text: 35|42|tannalute atutt oru takkitukaran varunna paksam tannal etearu samudayattekkalum sanmargam svikarikkunnavarakamenn avarekkeant satyam ceyyan kaliyunnatinre paramavadhi avar allahuvinre peril satyam ceyt parannu. ennal oru takkitukaran avarute atutt vannappeal at avarkk akalcca matrame vard'dhippiccullu
